subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Cornerback Dimitri Patterson and receiver Stephen Hill, two of the Jets’ training-camp disappointments, were released as the team trimmed its roster to the league-mandated 53-man limit.
snippet: Cornerback Dimitri Patterson and receiver Stephen Hill, two of the Jets’ training-camp disappointments, were released as the team trimmed its roster to the league-mandated 53-man limit.
